title: Sweet Mercy
description: Daphne Morelli is trapped in a gilded cage.She fought to escape her family, only to be caught by a billionaire. Possessive. Commanding. And determined to keep her.Emerson LeBlanc wants to own the little painter. She's become more than his obsession. She's part of his collection now.Except she's more perceptive than he'd like. Her artist's eye sees the shadows in him. She paints his pain on stretched canvas.He's determined to own her. She's determined to escape.In the end only one of them can truly be free.
author: Amelia Wilde
